page.title: 06Transport around Maylandsea.
page.content: {Eastern National Bus Co.}have a service Mayland to Maldon & Burnham between 6.2Oam & 7.2Opm though midday they run rarely.The service from Maylandsea is provided primarily for {Bradwell Power Station workers, thisleaves at 6.2Oam and returns at 7.4Opm. {Buses to and from the schools}at Burnham,Latchingdon & Mayland are run by Ford's Coaches Ltd. {The Mayl Bus}runs to and from Maldon every two hours from 9.3Oam to 3.3Opm at a nominal cost of 39p. Little local employment is available so most workers commute. The nearest railway station is about 5 miles away and{private transport}is essential.One or two car families are the rule. {Roads}are in process of being made up to County Standard though a fair number will remain sub-standard.
